data.title: Shop the best post-Prime Day deals under $100: Bissell, Keurig, DeWalt
data.meta_description: Amazon Prime Day 2024 is officially over, but thousands of sales are still running after the sale. Find the best deals on all your favorites; from clothing to kitchen, furniture, fitness, beauty, and more.
data.text:
Amazon Prime Day 2024 has officially concluded, marking the 10th anniversary of the most-anticipated shopping event of the season.

Thousands of Prime Day sales are only offered on July 16 and 17 — but Prime members can still act fast if they want to score great deals on top of free next-day or two-day delivery.

With thousands of best-selling items still on sale — from luxury kitchen appliances to home decor, outdoor gear, celeb-loved beauty products, and more — it can be difficult to know where and when to start shopping. Leave it to the people who shop for a living. The Post Wanted team has spent hours combing through thousands of the best post-Prime Day deals, so you can decide what’s worth the buy, and let us warn you — there was no shortage of tempting options.

RELATED: When does Amazon Prime Day 2024 end

Below, find the best deals under $100 that you can still shop now, including cooking essentials, quality tools, stylish clothing, elevated furniture and decor, best-selling beauty, and more.

RELATED: All the secret Amazon Prime benefits you’re missing out on

Shop this article by category:

Home | Beauty & Wellness | Tech | Kitchen | Beauty & Wellness | Clothing | Fitness & Outdoors | Baby

Best-selling products from Prime Day 2024

Bissell Little Green Carpet Cleaner

An Amazon #1 Bestseller, Bissell’s Little Green Carpet Cleaner is a highly recommended product for those in need of a portable and lightweight cleaner with powerful suction, large tank capacity, and an unmatched ability to remove pet stains and odors. Hurry now to secure this cleaner at a great price.

DEWALT 20V Max Cordless Drill/Driver Kit

Now’s the time to check off the list of #DIY projects, and this handy cordless drill kit from DeWalt is just what you’ll need to make those simpler fixes. The compact, lightweight design fits easily in tighter spots while delivering of up to 300 watts of power for a wide range of applications.

Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker

Bring your playlist on all your indoor and outdoor adventures with this wireless, portable speaker by Bose. The Flex has been rigorously tested to meet IP67 waterproof speaker standards and even floats. The durable build withstands even the toughest drops and knocks, so you can keep bumping to your favorite beats without worry.

Japanese Floor Mattress

Don’t look sideways at this pick. You may prefer it to your regular mattress. It’s made from a blend of microfiber and cotton, and is really comfortable. Best of all, it folds up and comes with its own storage bag. Keep it around for guests or when you visit inlaws who are still making you sleep on the couch.

Dreo Tower Fan for Bedroom

Do yourself and your electric bill a favor. This floor fan will help you skip the A.C. the humid summer. Offering 4 speeds and 90-degree oscillation, you’ll love how quiet it is and how efficiently it cools a room.

ZINUS Van 16-inch Metal Platform Bed Frame

The ZINUS Van Metal Platform Bed Frame offers sturdy and reliable support with its durable steel construction and reinforced design. Featuring a 16-inch height, it provides ample under-bed storage space, while its simple assembly and noise-free construction make it a practical and convenient choice for any bedroom.

SAFAVIEH Madison Collection Area Rug

It’s not often you see a deal on an 8′ x 10 rug that makes your jaw drop, but this SAFAVIEH Madison Collection Area Rug has just the right amount of details, fading, and color to give your entryway, living room, or kitchen that major *wow* factor.

RELATED: How Amazon Prime Day has transformed online shopping

Beauty and wellness

Waterpik Cordless Advanced Water Flosser

The Waterpik offers a convenient and effective solution for maintaining oral hygiene on the go. With its powerful water jet, three pressure settings, and cordless design, it efficiently removes plaque and debris between teeth and below the gumline, ensuring a thorough and comfortable clean.

Grande Cosmetics GrandeLASH-MD Lash Enhancing Serum

Growing out your lashes takes patience and commitment, but Grand Cosmetics has an ophthalmologist-tested serum that might just bring the transformation you’re looking for. Thousands of reviewers agree that this formula increased the length and volume of their lashes over time, and some have even suggested they stopped wearing mascara.

MANSCAPED The Lawn Mower Body Hair Trimmer

Dubbed the “Lawn Mower Ultra,” this waterproof shave set includes everything you need to shave down there — including two Interchangeable blade heads, a trimmer blade and foil blade, one fixed-length comb, and two adjustable combs. Dual-temp LEDs better illuminate the skin so everyone can feel confident trimming sensitive areas.

Kitchen

SodaStream Art Sparkling Water Maker Bundle

If staying hydrated is a concern for you this summer, you may just need to invest in a SodaStream. This cylindrical tube quickly turns up to 60 liters of tap into perfectly carbonated sparkling water at the push of a button. Create your own signature soda or try out two of the complimentary bubbly flavors to add a little punch to your pop.

COSORI 12-in-1 Air Fryer

Whether you’re in the mood to fry up some fresh potato wedges, sear a steak, or reheat last night’s leftovers — Cososri’s 12-in-1 Air Fryer has all the cooking functions to take care of your tastes. The iconic, quick-heating 360-degree heat circulation leaves all your dishes with crispy textures and extraordinary flavor.

CAROTE Pots and Pans Set Nonstick

Give your kitchen an upgrade with CAROTE’s collection of fine, nonstick pots and pans. This durable die-cast cooking set heats up quickly and evenly and cleans up easily. Included two frying pans, a saucepan, a casserole pot, a saute pan, and a white silicone turner.

RELATED: History of Amazon Prime Day on the 10th anniversary

Tech

Beats Studio Buds

With over 90,000 Amazon reviews, you can assume Beats are among the best headphones on the market But, it’s especially hard to beat these buds if you’re looking for something that offers a customizable acoustic platform that can switch between noise cancelling and transparency mode. The listening options are limitless — and you can choose from the three soft ear tips to find just the right fit.

Polaroid Go Generation 2

Meet the new and improved Polaroid Go Generation 2. This instant camera has been upgraded with a wider aperture range, precise light sensor, and on-point exposure settings for capturing all your favorite memories as crisp photos with the same desirable retro look and feel.

RELATED: Amazon Prime Day spending expected to surpass $14B

HP OfficeJet 8015e Wireless Color All-in-One Printer

Perhaps not the most exciting post-Prime Day purchase, but certainly an intelligent investment to make when a sale arises. HP’s best-selling OfficeJet Printer is ideal for households and small offices, allowing multiple users to print and scan professional-quality documents straight from their smartphones.

Clothing

Calvin Klein Men’s Cotton Stretch 7-Pack Boxer Brief

Refresh the underwear drawer with a fresh set of Calvin’s. This multi-pack comes with a pair for every day of the week, offered in the classic square boxer design, with the iconic branding along the elastic waistband.

Levi’s Women’s Size 501 Original Fit Jeans

With their flattering, yet relaxed cut and sea of casual shades, the revolutionary Levi’ 501s have continued defining the denim category since 1973. Score a pair of these classic jeans after Prime Day, and you’ll quickly find yourself wanting a pair in every color.

Nutrafol Women’s Vegan Hair Growth Supplements

If you’ve been dreaming of luscious locks and ore length, now may be the time to consider starting Nutrafol. This best-selling Hair Growth vitamin targets the root causes of hair loss, including stress, gut health, and nutritional gaps. Results can be seen in as soon as three months, and specific formulas are offered for men and women.

Fitness and Outdoors

LifeStraw Personal Water Filter for Hiking

Are you a hardcore camper or just love to spend time in the outdoors? The personal water filtration system from LifeStraw is your next purchase. Customers praise LifeStraw’s effectiveness in protecting against bacteria, so you can drink water from a lake, river, or pond. The design is also lightweight, durable, and small enough to carry in a pocket or bag.

Igloo BMX Hard Coolers

An IGLOO cooler is another solid investment for all of your outdoor adventures, camping trips, and patio parties. The BMX hard-shelled style improves cooling capacity by elevating the cooler body away from hot surfaces. Four tie-down points allow you to keep your tank secure during transport, and the generous size stores up to 52 quarts of ice, drinks, and more.

Sunny Health & Fitness Mini Stepper

Who said workout machines need to be expensive? This convenient, budget-friendly Mini Stepper is a great way to get your heart rate up in a smaller space. Throw it under your desk and burn some calories while getting on with your work day.

Baby

Evolur Zoodle 2 in 1 Baby High Chair

Another fantastic investment: this award-winning Evolur Zoodle High Chair grows with your baby, featuring an adjustable feeding tray and two footrests. You can start by using this high-chair at the table, and convert it into a toddler chair as your little one grows. It’s also got the rest of the essentials; a five-point safety harness, padded shoulder belt, and removable seat cover for easy cleaning.

Owlet Cam Baby Monitor with Camera and Audio

The transition to parenthood is intense. So intense at times, that it can be nerve-wracking to leave your little one alone for more than five minutes. The Owlet sock connects with an app to deliver real-time health readings, including live pulse rate and oxygen. Parents can also use the sock to monitor their baby’s sleep trends and patterns, which is especially useful when working on getting your baby on a regular schedule.

Delta Children Personalized Sherpa Cozee Chair

Sick of your toddler crawling up on the adult furniture? As soon as your little one is fully independent in terms of mobility, they’re going to want a chair to themselves. This personalized option can be designed in a variety of colors and fonts to fit their style, making it a superb birthday surprise, bedroom redesign accessory, or Christmas-in-July type of gift.

Your Prime Day FAQs, answered

What is Amazon Prime Day?

Amazon Prime Day is the retailer’s very own shopping event that typically spans two days. Traditionally, it occurs once a year in July.

How long does Prime Day last?

Amazon is hosting Prime Day 2024 from 3 a.m. ET on Tuesday, July 16, through 3 a.m. ET on Wednesday, July 18.

When does Prime Day end?

Prime Day ends July 17 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific time, so east coasters have until about 3 a.m. on July 18, their time to shop the deals. That said, there are some extended deals worth shopping, going on now.

When is the next Prime Day?

Already wondering when the next Amazon Prime Day is in 2024? Prime Day takes place in July each year. While Amazon hasn’t confirmed the dates for Prime Day 2025, it’s safe to assume it will take place in mid-July — similar to previous years. However,

Since 2022, a similar sales event has been taking place in October under different monikers, which has acted as a precursor to their Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales.

In 2022, it was called the Early Access Sale, and in 2023, the Prime Big Deal Days.

Do you have to have Amazon Prime for Prime Day?

While Prime members can take full advantage of Amazon Prime Day (plus all the benefits of the subscription), interested shoppers can grab a 30-day free trial to enjoy Prime Day with no strings attached.

What are the best Prime Day deals?

From reporting on Amazon Prime Day throughout the years, we can tell you for certain that it’s the ideal period to pick up a new mattress, restock some new or upgraded kitchen items and comb through the massive catalog of Amazon best-sellers.

Don’t miss Post Wanted’s around-the-clock coverage. Click here to find all of the best deals.

Hunting for a headline-worthy haul? Keep shopping with Post Wanted.
